===
**Note about limitations of pRESTO tools within Galaxy:**
pRESTO tools in galaxy have the following limitations vs. when run at the command line:
* Inputs must be FASTQ format and cannot be FASTA format. * Multiple inputs files are not supported per argument (e.g. ``-1``, ``-2`` or ``-s``), i.e. - Steps that take a pair of fastq inputs can only take two files, not two sets of files - Steps that take a single set of fastq inputs can only take a single file * The ``--outdir`` and ``--outname`` options are not supported; output files are named directly
